story_09_06000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Hmm... You said Iris is the Champion of
the Unova region, didn’t you?
story_09_06000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Yep... I can’t believe Lear is neck and neck
with her in this battle!
story_09_06000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I mean, Master Lear’s a genius...
Plus, he trains suuuper hard.
story_09_06000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Champion or not, I doubt she’ll be able to
defeat the young master. I’m sure it’ll be the
same next time he faces that kid in the red hat...
story_09_06000/2401_1001_0900_10: Quiet, you! I told you not to talk about that!
story_09_06000/2401_1001_1000_10:
And how dare you compare me to this sappy
little girl! All this nonsense about friends and
working together... Don’t make me laugh!
story_09_06000/2401_1001_1100_10:
You talk like you’re battling all by yourself,
but you’re not alone!
story_09_06000/2401_1001_1200_10:
What, you mean Rachel and Sawyer?
They serve as my retainers, nothing more.
They may be loyal, but they are not my friends.
story_09_06000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Well, what about the Pokémon that battle
alongside you? That Krookodile is like a
trusty partner to you, isn’t he?
story_09_06000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Hah! Pokémon are no different. They’re tools!
Tools used by Trainers who want to rise
to the top! I have no need for friends.
story_09_06000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Is that really what you think?
The way I see it, Iris has been fighting
neck and neck with you...
story_09_06000/2401_1001_1600_10:
despite being in a place she’s unfamiliar with...
despite how tired she must be after battling
all of those Team Break thugs earlier...
story_09_06000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Why do you think that is? If you ask me,
I’d attribute it to the incredibly strong bond
Iris has with her Pokémon.
story_09_06000/2401_1001_1900_10:
I’m done listening to a bunch of amateurs who
think they can lecture me! Rachel, Sawyer,
we’re leaving!
story_09_06000/2401_1001_2200_10:
I just want you to know...
I stand by what I said!
story_09_06000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Mr. Pryce was right. The bond between
Trainers and Pokémon is really important
when it comes to battling!
story_09_06000/2401_1001_2400_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]... Do you think we
could have a battle?
story_09_06000/2401_1001_2500_10: I kinda want to try a team battle!
